TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Evo_Morales, title = Evo_Morales, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Evo_Morales} }

S.FORM: I 1959 a miheca saka 10 folad saka 26 a romi'ad masofoc ci Evo Morales , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Bolivia anini i ci Evo Morales, patirengan a romi'ad i 2006 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 22 a romi'ad.

I 1959 a miheca saka 10 folad saka 26 a romi'ad masofoc ci Evo Morales , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Bolivia anini i ci Evo Morales, patirengan a romi'ad i 2006 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 22 a romi'ad.
